title: Melinda French Gates - The Giving Pledge

quotes: Over four decades ago, when I was a high school senior in Dallas, Texas, I had the chance to speak at my class’s graduation ceremony.
In 2000, I helped create the Gates Foundation, which is dedicated to a world where every person has the chance to lead a healthy and productive life.

organizations.name: Gates Foundation
quotes: In 2000, I helped create the Gates Foundation, which is dedicated to a world where every person has the chance to lead a healthy and productive life.
Over four decades ago, when I was a high school senior in Dallas, Texas, I had the chance to speak at my class’s graduation ceremony.
At the time, I was on the cusp of an exciting new chapter: a move to North Carolina to pursue a degree in computer science.
I commit my time, energy, and efforts to the work of fighting poverty and advancing equality—for women and girls and other marginalized groups—in the United States and around the world.
